1556140.name: Show me VR
1556140.description:
This app allows you to transfer presentations conferences and even exhibitions into virtual reality, for a truly unique experience allows the user to upload their presentations and other documentation to view in virtual reality. All you have to do to do is register on our website and set up a conference.
Show me VR is a cheaper, safer and much more convenient alternative for a gathering of any kind.
Turn your presentation into an exciting VR show for your customers and partners.

You can upload your own content just in 2 clicks in any format:
âƒ pdf
âƒ jpeg
âƒ any video, including 360
âƒ ppt, pptx

Invite participants or add a colleague for a joint presentation.

Draw a full house and present your product or share ideas with an unlimited number of users. By the way, you don't have to leave the house for that.ğŸ™‚

We are already making presentations on the platform
âƒ Presentations and conferences of any scale
âƒ Presentations of startup projects
âƒ Development and investment projects
âƒ Visiting museums and Art galleries
âƒ Presentations by private artists and 3D creators
âƒ Sealed-bid auctions
âƒ Showroom presentations of new Auto concerns
And much more

Try to create and hold your first presentation in VR, and it's completely free.[/b]
